title: Financial News - Crypto Winter: How Long Will It Last, What's Next?
description: The crypto winter has descended – and even the biggest names in digital assets are feeling the chill. As institutional investors look on and the clamour for regulation grows ever louder, Financial News speaks to Gwendolyn Regina, investment director at the world’s largest crypto exchange Binance, and Ari Redbord, head of legal and government affairs at blockchain intelligence group TRM Labs, to find out what’s next, and how to navigate the increasingly stormy crypto landscape.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
